channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Groen (Greens/EFA): 1 seats
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België (GUE/NGL): 1 seats
  • Vooruit (S&D): 2 seats
  • Vlaams Belang (PfE): 3 seats
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie (ECR): 3–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Groen (Greens/EFA): 6.3–8.5%
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten (RE): 4.8–6.8%
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België (GUE/NGL): 7.8–10.2%
  • Vooruit (S&D): 13.3–16.3%
  • Vlaams Belang (PfE): 18.9–22.3%
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (EPP): 12.3–15.2%
  • Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie (ECR): 25.1–28.8%
